data.title: Participants
data.meta_description: At Rock 'n' Roll Las Vegas, you get to run The Strip at night in the entertainment capital of the world — where everything is bigger and brighter.
data.text:
^ Adding Translated Content

In the text block above, use these options as needed:

中文 (Chinese)

English

Español

Français

German

Italiano

Filipino

Copy the layout container with original content. The layout container must have a custom class. See below for the custom classes needed for this page (CSS must match exactly):

lng-中文chinese

lng-english

lng-español

lng-français

lng-german

lng-italiano

lng-filipino

Proceed to edit the page elements and replace copy with the updated language.

^ Changing Distances

This table populates the available distances on the race page and its subpages. The distances listed should match what's displayed on the race card. The distances on the race page and its subpages as well as the race card are managed by Webmasters. Please submit your distance changes to them.

^ Updating Register Button

This registration link should match the Race Registration Status on the race card. Both are managed by Webmasters. Please submit your updated status and registration link targets to them.

The link title should only be one of the following:

Coming Soon

Register Now

Get Notified

Sold Out

PRESALE

Discontinued

Closed

Postponed

Rescheduled

EXPO

To set the default language for this race page and its sub pages, there can only be one default language. If a default language is not needed for a race, this container can be deleted from the top template.

The language must adhere to the special characters, similar to the "Select Language" dropdown (i.e. français.)

The race page must have the default language in the "Select Language" dropdown AND there must be layout containers with custom classes on them.

All Distances

For all Rock 'n' Roll Las Vegas distances, participants will be assigned a group color on their bib, and corresponding start line loading time and entry point based on estimated finish time entered at the time of registration.

Assigned bib colors will be available at the Health & Fitness Expo presented by Resorts World.

You must start after your assigned group color is announced. There will be no group color changes.

Bib loading schedules are below!

Gear up for race night with an enhanced experience at the Start Village featuring live entertainment and music, photo opportunities, exclusive activations and more.

Location: Start Village ~ Toshiba Plaza at T-Mobile Arena

Village Open Time: 2pm

*Please note: the Start Village is optional. Participants may proceed directly to their bib color loading area near the start line. However, we don't recommend missing any of the fun!

We can't wait to see you at the start line in 2024! Until then, make sure you stay in the know by checking out the participant information below. We'll be sharing all the latest race weekend updates to make sure you're race day ready!

Resorts World Las Vegas is the presenting sponsor of your 2024 Rock ‘n’ Roll Running Series Las Vegas Health & Fitness Expo! With a live DJ, larger than life photo ops, & so much more, you’ll have to see for yourself how Rock 'n' Roll Las Vegas gets the party started on The Strip.

The Resorts World Las Vegas experience doesn’t stop there… On Sunday night, the half marathon will stream live on the 100,000 square-foot LED screen (featuring you!). Plus, Resorts World Las Vegas is offering participants and guests these exclusive race weekend experiences.

Rock ‘n’ Roll Las Vegas features a two-day Health & Fitness Expo prior to the race, which all participants must visit in order to pick up their race packets. Free and open to the public, this expo features the latest in running technologies, fitness apparel, health & nutrition information and interactive displays. All runners must visit the expo to pick up their race number, gear bag and t-shirt.

Date: 2/22/24-2/24/24

Location: Resorts World Las Vegas

Expo Hours:

Thursday, February 22, 2024: 3pm-6pm

Friday, February 23, 2024: 10am-6pm

Saturday, February 24, 2024: 9am-5pm

Bibs for the Saturday 5K will be available at the Expo until 2pm

Interested in becoming an Exhibitor? For more information on becoming a Rock ‘n’ Roll exhibitor, please visit expo.ironman.com.

Participants may pick up a packet for one additional participant. Our +1 Bib Pick-Up Program allows you to collect a single family member or friend’s bib(s), t-shirt(s) and gear bag at the Expo. You must present a copy of a valid proof of identification for the participant. Acceptable identification includes a valid driver’s license, state issued ID or passport. The name on the identification must match the registration. Present a copy of the participants valid ID at the Expo bib pick-up station and our team will assist you. Please note, if the participant you would like to pick up for has not signed their waiver, you will not be able to pick up their bib. Please reference the FAQs for instructions on how to sign your event waiver.

If you do not know anyone else racing and are unable to attend the Health & Fitness Expo presented by Resorts World Las Vegas, you will need to purchase the Race Day Bib Pick Up as we do not mail bibs. Please note: we do not require you to purchase the Race Day Bib Pick Up if you are a participant in the 5K. Steps to purchase Race Day Bib Pick Up:

Open a new browser page for the Active.com website: https://myevents.active.com

Sign in to your Active.com account

Hover over your name in the top right corner and select “My Events”

Click the “Purchase Merchandise” button under the 2024 Rock ‘n’ Roll Running Series Las Vegas

Top choice on the is the Race Day Bib Pick Up for $50
